title: Clustering 3K PBMCs with Scanpy
questions: What are the main steps of scRNA-seq?
What kind of variation can confound an analysis?
objectives: Learn the main stages of an scRNA-seq analysis
Understand the methods and concepts underlying scRNA-seq
key_points: Knowing the difference between hard and soft clustering
A KNN graph can be generated from a count matrix.
Community clustering can be generated from a KNN graph.

workflows.name: Clustering 3k PBMC with Scanpy
workflows.title: Clustering 3k PBMC with Scanpy
workflows.description: Workflow based on clustering 3K PBMCs with Scanpy tutorial
